experience: You and KG both know Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, Mohsen Gamshad, and 42 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
KG worked at Charles Schwab before you started
Co-Founder and Head - Analytics, Customer Systems, IOT Platform

AerLinX is a Bay Area stealth startup focused on transforming the way electricity, a $150 billion market in the midst of deregulation, is priced and sold to over 100 MM homes in US and Canada.  AerLinX’s helps deregulated electricity marketers double their profits and capture a substantial share of highly profitable customer segments by leveraging AerLinX’s platform capabilities: adaptive multi-domain optimization, customer intelligence, big data analytics and seamless IOT integration.  AerLinX open, unified, scalable platform combines several technologies – heterogeneous networks, unified messaging, deep analytic models, big data and real time control of all enabled devices at homes, big data, and cloud infrastructure. Architecture - AWS Cloud Infrastructure, IOT Platform, Big Data Platforms (Apache Spark, Hadoop Clusters), Data Science Tools ( R, Python), BI Platforms using SQL and NoSQL DBs
Head - Enterprise Information Management (Analytics, BI, EDW, Big Data)

Technology head of Delta’s Enterprise Information Management, BI and Analytics initiatives. Additional role as solution delivery owner of Delta’s Multi-Channel Marketing, Enterprise Financial Services and HR Application Platforms.Analytics, BI, Data Management, Enterprise Data Warehouse, Customer Intelligence, Marketing Analytics, Multi-Channel Marketing Systems. Big Data Initiatives, Predictive Modelling. Health Care Analytics - Utilization Management, Claims, ProviderMulti-Channel Customer Intelligence and Marketing Automation Platform  Delta’s Data and Application platforms included - SAP Business Objects, Tableau, SiSense, BO Lumira, Microsoft SSIS, SAP Information Steward,  Oracle Hyperion, 18 TB 3NF Inmon style Oracle DW, Hadoop Cluster and Multiple Kimball Dimensional Data Marts.Application Platforms -  Adobe Neolane Marketing platform and Oracle EBS.

Boutique professional services start-ups ($ 5 to 15 M) with customers in Insurance, Payments, Retail eCommerce, High tech and Telecommunications industry sectors. Responsibilities include leading engagements with customers, driving technology strategy/roadmap, platform evaluations and business architecture;•	Digital Platform (Mobile, Web) and CRM Strategy (SFDC, RightNow) and Architecture, focusing on multi-Channel (Mobile, Online and partner channels) customer experience - Insurance Customer.•	BI Architecture, data model design, reporting and dashboards delivery using SiSense and OfBiz platform - Payments/Financial Services start-up.•	BI and Analytics Strategy, BI technology platform evaluations (Microsoft BI Tools), Data Architecture, and Governance processes - medical device/services customer.•	MDM Workshop, Architecture and solution strategy using Talend, Tableau – Telecommunications and CRM Software customer.   •	ECommerce Architecture, BI Strategy for retail customers (US and Latin America) – Oracle ATG Platform, Endeca, Google Analytics, Oracle CRM, Fatwire.SpecialtiesMulti-Channel CRM Architecture and solution strategy.  Focused on business cost benefit that can come from these initiatives.BI and Analytics Strategy, BI Tools Evaluation, Master Data Management and Data Governance Strategy; Data Integration strategy, Siebel, Salesforce.com, OBIEE, Business Objects
Managing Director - Enterprise CRM and Business Intelligence Technology program

Technology leader and Application Platform owner for the Enterprise-wide CRM and Business Intelligence Program at Schwab.The CRM and BI/EDW Platforms at Schwab included multiple Oracle/ Siebel CRM systems, multiple instances of SFDC, Oracle BI (OBIEE), Business Objects, Informatica ETL, a HDM on a 70TB Teradata data warehouse, eGain Integrated Communication (email, Chat, Co-browse) system and Oracle FUSION / IBM WPS Orchestration systems implemented  across all Schwab Business enterprises and serving more than 10000+ users. • Managed a direct team of Sr. Managers and Directors, a 60+ people, $12+ Million annual budget, and geographically distributed organization including Offshore Development teams. Managed major vendor partnerships (Oracle, Siebel, IBM, Wipro, Infosys and eGain).•	Strong experience in leading transformational initiatives resulting in a build-out of strategic solutions across multiple business enterprises.
Principal Consultant - Business Engineering and Technology Strategy Practice

Business Architecture; Solutions Architecture, Evaluation of new technologies and Enterprise Application platforms; Develop technology architecture and roadmap for F500 Clients: Financial Services, Telecommunications, High Tech Sectors.Specialities: BI/Analytics, Identity Management, Business Process Analysis, SOA, J2EE Application Stacks

recommendations: Panos Lambrianides
Scientist/Entrepreneur
October 29, 2012, KG worked with Panos in the same group

KG Muthukumar is a talented executive, who displays the amphibious ability of functioning in both the business and technology world with equal adroitness.  While I worked with KG at Schwab, he developed the CRM system from a nascent disorganized collection of databases to a mature analytical engine, capable of teasing out new client marketing opportunities.  Moreover KG worked very hard to develop intuitive user interfaces and an enterprise level messaging system to allow end business users the ability to analyse user needs with great ease and insight.KG was very well regarded in the firm as a "can do" person.  His ability to anticipate the business needs was well known and the services of the group he managed were sought after.  KG is a great believer in cultivating strong inter-personal relationships and is a great joy to work with. He has a keen intellect and learns new business models and technologies very quickly.KG is also able to build technology teams "de novo" and to foster a team spirit and cultivate company loyalty.  He started out managing a small team at Schwab, and as his influence grew, he ended up managing a very large group fulfilling a role more senior than what his title suggested.I would not hesitate to endorse KG as a technology or business executive.  He would be a great asset for whoever would be fortunate enough to hire him.

KG's possesses deep business analysis, technical acumen and strategic business development capacities.   He took on a an entirely new market opportunity and technology arena  around a core solution in a new Internet Solutions line of business.  Tackling an entirely new PKI security set of applications, he quickly developed a coherent market strategy and product direction, developed trusted and effective customer partnerships with key lighthouse accounts - global financial and payments institutions -- as well as driving product planning relationships with our engineering group.  This internet infrastructure solutions group moved to a strategic new line-of-business for Tandem; KG advanced quickly to manage a group of senior product managers owning product delivery and go-to-market for this suite of products - driving to revenue and market recognition.

Raj Seenu
Data Management, Business Intelligence and Database Administration
September 9, 2012, Raj reported directly to KG

I have known KG for 8 years. We worked together on CRM Analytics Implementation. KG is no doubt a great leader and a visionary. His highly dynamic personality with crystal clear focus and objectivity is highly sought by both, his superior as well as his business partners and subordinates. He is out-of-box thinker and due to this reason many project related issues just got resolved, by seeking out his guidance only. He sees a bigger picture opportunity than most people I've met, and breaks the task down so the short- and long-term objectives coexist and compliment each other. Finally, KG brings a sense of comraderie to the business which makes working with him doubly rewarding. He is a great professional and a leader who leads by example. His commitment and dedication are a source of inspiration to others. Strengths include high degree of customer focus, good understanding of business processes apart from technology expertise, providing guidance and encouragement to his team to think creatively and offer solutions that add value to customers. I cherish working with KG and would love to work with him in future as well.

April 24, 2008, Connie worked with KG in the same group

I’ve worked very closely with Connie for a number of years at Tandem and Compaq, during a very turbulent time, when emerging internet technologies and solutions were changing the industry and the economic environment.Connie is one the strongest Strategic Marketing and Business Development Directors I've worked with. Connie is a true professional capable of forward thinking and strategic decision making. She has an excellent skill set (both technical and business), is results driven and exhibits a high level of integrity. She is comfortable navigating complex organizational structures, global markets and cultures. Her knowledge of the industry, technologies, and the time/effort she takes to pursue different perspectives and opinions to develop a broad understanding of customers’ business needs and goals were the key success factors to providing excellent systems solutions to our customers and delivering results for the organization. Connie is a dedicated individual and I feel very fortunate to have worked with her. Emerging companies need people like her to fulfill their mission on behalf of equity holders.

summary: Customer-focused business and technology leader with a unique blend of global experience in Enterprise Applications and Solutions Architecture, Technology Strategy, Product Management and Industry Marketing.•	Extensive experience in aligning technology strategy, architecture, people leadership and executive management to business strategy.•	Led large scale CRM, Digital Platform and Customer Value Chain initiatives, overseeing software architecture, and delivery of enterprise class applications – CRM, Marketing Automation and DW/BI/Analytics implementations both on Premise and Cloud/SaaS based, Unified Customer Interaction Management Systems in the context of multi-channel customer touch-points, Customer MDM across channels/businesses, and integration with back-end fulfillment, payment and master data systems using EAI/SOA platforms. My areas of interest currently are in business strategies, technologies and products that address:1. Analytics, Business Intelligence, Data Warehousing, Master Data Management and Data Governance;2. Multi-Channel CRM solutions – Sales and Service, Marketing Automation;	3. Enterprise Digital Platform Business Architecture and Solutions.
